ygData.subject: Re: Selo's
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok, tested it at 46 with a Mistmoore drum.  Got a speed increase of 2.27x faster than normal running.  My previous test at L45 had a 2.25x increase over
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 18 Feb 2000, Ronnie Roads wrote:
>
> Perceptually Selo's is about 30% slower for me (level 50,
> Selo's drum) since the patch.
>
> I unfortunately have no hard baseline against which to
> compare. Would someone who does please repeat a test?

Ok, tested it at 46 with a Mistmoore drum. Got a speed
increase of 2.27x faster than normal running. My previous
test at L45 had a 2.25x increase over normal running. So
there's been no change (unless they slowed down normal running
speed).

There's still the possibility they tweaked the high end speed
cap. Guess I'll just have to get myself a Selo's drum...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
